extensionShortName.description: A shortened name of the extension.

extensionDescription.message: a cool photon theme. webextension version based off of paxmod.

desc-name.message: Hover over an item to see its description

export.description: Apply options to the interface. The ID is a leftover from the website.

reload-extension-header.description: Header for the reload extension section.

reload-text.message: Reloads the extension to potentially fix some issues. This does not clear your data.
reload-text.description: Reloads the extension to potenially fix issues and does not remove data.

new-tab-background-header.description: Header for the new tab background section.

newtab-notice.message: uc.newtab.background isn't enabled. Background won't be shown.
newtab-notice.description: Notice to tell the user that they need to enable uc.newtab.background to show the background.

preview-container.message: Click to open in a new tab.

apierror-title-text.description: Heading of the API error page.

apierror-page-title.description: Title of the API error page. This is the title of the tab that opens.

apierrorShortDesc.message:
Zap's Cool Photon Theme was unable to load since it was unable to access the bundled API Experiments.

Please verify that:

apierror-line-1.message: You're using Firefox Developer Editon, Firefox Nightly, or Firefox ESR.
apierror-line-1.description: First line of the API error list which states that the user must use the Firefox Developer Editon or the Firefox Nightly browsers.

apierror-line-2.message: extensions.experiments.enabled is set to true in about:config.
apierror-line-2.description: First line of the API error list which states that extensions.experiments.enabled must be enabled in about:config.

apierror-fileissue.message: Nothing works? File an issue on GitHub.
apierror-fileissue.description: File an issue on GitHub if nothing works.

custom-css-note.message: Your CSS will load as an author sheet and will be injected into everything. It is recommended to encapsulate your CSS with @-moz-document url-prefix("chrome://"), url-prefix("resource://") { } to only load it into the browser chrome.
custom-css-note.description: Notes for users about the custom CSS.

apply-css-button.description: Button for applying the custom CSS.

test-css-button.description: Button for testing the custom CSS.

author.description: self-explanatory. You can also append your name if you're localizing this.

browser-fork-header.description: Header for the browser fork settings section.

browser-fork-text.message: Set this to the browser you're currently using for fixes and adjustments for your browser (if you're not using Firefox).
browser-fork-text.description: Text for the browser fork settings section

fork-firefox.description: Firefox label in the browser fork dropdown.

fork-floorp.description: Floorp label in the browser fork dropdown.

fork-librewolf.description: LibreWolf label in the browser fork dropdown.

fork-tor.description: Tor Browser label in the browser fork dropdown.

fork-waterfox.description: Waterfox label in the browser fork dropdown.
